page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT IN OUR VILLAGE
page.content: {ENTERTAINMENT}IN THE VILLAGE MOSTLY REVOLVES AROUND THE VILLAGE HALL.THE HALL HAS A COMMITTEE WHO ORGANISE THE MAINILY SPORTING ACTIVITIES.BOWLING, MONDAYS AND THURSDAYS;BADMINTON ON WEDNESDAY.{THE HALL}IS ALSO USED ON TUESDAY AFTERNOON AS A BANK AND ON THE THIRD WEDNESDAY OF THE MONTH AS THE MEETING PLACE FOR THE WOMANS RURAL INSTITUTE.MOST OF THE PEOPLE USING THE HALL ARE FROM THE VILLAGE OR THE SURROUNDING AREA. { {BA,DAY }IS A DAY FOR PEOPLE TO ENJOY THEMSELVES.WHAT HAPPENS IS ADULTS PUT BALLS TIED UP WITH RIBBON.THEY THROW THE BALL AND THE"EASTIES"AND THE "WESTIES" HAVE TO GET IT TO A CERTAIN PLACE.THE SAYING IS{"FIRST {COMES CANDLEMAS THEN THE NEW MOON AND {THE NEXT TUESDAY AFTER THAT IS BA,DAY. THERE ARE TWO PUBLIC HOUSES WHICH HAVE LUNCHES IN SUMMER,MAINLY FOR TOURISTS.
